title: PowBlocks
author: PowBlocks
content: üî• PowBlocks Twitter Bounty Campaign üî•üì¢ Here's How to Join:1Ô∏è‚É£ Stay Updated: üê¶ Ensure you're following our official Twitter handle.2Ô∏è‚É£ Engage: ‚ù§Ô∏è Show some love! Like and retweet our latest posts.3Ô∏è‚É£ Share Your Thoughts: üí≠ Craft tweets about PoWBlocks and retweet our posts.4Ô∏è‚É£ Remember the Tags: üè∑Ô∏è Always include #PoWBlocks and $XPB in your tweets..üëâ Fill this form to participate in the campaign: https://forms.gle/VBkD3NTZ23nzAAVk6üèÜ Reward Details:Bounty Pool: üí∞ A whopping 20,000 XPB is set aside for participants!How It's Allocated: üîÑ Your influence isn't determined by your followers here. Instead, we're giving rewards based on the total number of views your tweets get.End Date: üìÖ The bounty pool closes on 31st October!.üîç Keep in Mind:üöÄ Jump in now as this campaign is for a limited duration.üîì Set your Twitter to public so we can track your activity.üó£Ô∏è You can submit your tweet links everyday or every week.‚ùå DO NOT change your XPB wallet address or twitter handle.‚ö† ¬†If you use fake or bot accounts then we will ban you from the campaign.
